content: ऋ {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} An interjection of(1) calling; (2) ridicule; (3) censure or abuse; (4) used at the beginning of a sentence.

ऋ {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (ऋच्छति, आर, आर्षीत्, अरिष्यति, ऋत; {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} अर्पयति; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} अरिरिषति) {@--1@} To go, move; अंभश्छायामच्छामृच्छति <ls>Śi. 4. 44.</ls> {@--2@} To rise, tend towards. {vII.v} {c3c} <ab>P.</ab> (इयर्ति, आरत्, ऋत) (Mostly used in the Veda) {@--1@} To go. {@--2@} To move, shake. {@--3@} To obtain, gain, acquire, reach, meet with. {@--4@} To move, excite, raise (as voice, words &c.) वाचमियर्ति. {@--5@} To display. {vIII.v} {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> (ऋणोति, ऋण) {@--1@} To injure, hurt. {@--2@} To attack. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (अर्पयति|आर्पिपत्, अर्पित) {@--1@} To throw, cast, fling; fix or implant in; हृदि शल्यमर्पितं <ls>R. 8. 87.</ls> {@--2@} To put or place on, fix upon, direct or cast towards (as the eye &c.); वामप्रकोष्ठार्पितहेमवेत्रः <ls>Ku. 3. 41</ls>; <ls>Ś. 6. 5</ls>, <ls n="Ś. 6.">17</ls>, <ls n="Ś.">3. 26</ls>; <ls>R. 17. 79</ls>; <ls>Ś. 6. 8</ls>; <ls>Bk. 5. 90</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 11</ls>; <ls>R. 15. 77</ls>; <ls>Bg. 8. 7</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">12. 14</ls>; करपल्लवार्पित <ls>Śi. 9. 54.</ls> {@--3@} To place in, insert, give, set or place; अपथे पदमर्पयंति हि <ls>R. 9. 74</ls>, <ls n="R. 9.">78</ls>; चित्रार्पितां <ls>Ś. 6. 15</ls> drawn in a picture; <ls>R. 2. 31</ls>; द्वारदेशे <ls>Amaru. 62</ls>; <ls>V. 4. 35</ls>; <ls>Mu. 7. 6</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 18</ls>; लोकोत्तरं चरितमर्पयति प्रतिष्ठां <ls>R. G.</ls> {@--4@} To hand or make over, give to, give in charge of, consign, deliver; इति सूतस्याभरणान्यर्पयति <ls>Ś. 1</ls>, <ls n="Ś.">4. 19</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 118</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 65.</ls> {@--5@} To give up, sacrifice (as the inherent sense); अत्र कलिंगगंगाशब्दौ आत्मानमर्पयतः <ls>S. D. 2.</ls> {@--6@} To give back, restore; <ls>R. 19. 10</ls>; <ls>Bk. 15. 16</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 94</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 191</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 169.</ls> {@--7@} To pierce through, perforate, penetrate.
